primitiveValues.formulaTemplate: What is a Business Account on Ndax? A Business Account on Ndax is designed for individuals and companies that want to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies using business funds. Key features of a Business Account include: The ability to buy, sell, and trade cryptocurrencies using funds from your business. Deposits and withdrawals can be made using a bank account registered in your businessâ€™s name. Multi-user access, allowing you to assign roles and permissions to different team members. Access to detailed transaction history, which can be viewed and downloaded for reporting or accounting purposes. In short: Personal accounts are intended for individual use. Business accounts are tailored for companies and organizations.
